name: @saekitominaga/customelements-portal
description: This custom element adds animation movement to the <portal> element and improves some accessibility issues.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/Portal.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.mjs -- terser dist/Portal.mjs -o dist/Portal.min.mjs -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=Portal.min.mjs,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Portal.min.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/Portal.min.mjs -m 1

author: Saeki Tominaga
